title: Virtual Talk: Haunted
hero_caption: Ivan Albright. Picture of Dorian Gray, 1943–44. Gift of Ivan Albright. © The Art Institute of Chicago.
short_description:
Ghouls, ghosts, and nightmares, oh my! Join educator Allison Muscolino for an encounter with some frightening favorites.

 In order to allow for conversation and exchange, capacity for this program is limited.
list_description: Ghouls, ghosts, and nightmares, oh my! Explore frightening favorites from the collection.
description:
Ghouls, ghosts, and nightmares, oh my! Join educator Allison Muscolino for an encounter with some frightening favorites.

 In order to allow for conversation and exchange, capacity for this program is limited.

This virtual event will be hosted on Zoom. Find Zoom tutorials and resources here. If you have any questions about virtual programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu.
